# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and achieve remarkable results. This exceptional item is valued at $1500000 to us, reflecting its unparalleled quality and capabilities. I am confident it holds immense potential to benefit you in ways we both can't yet imagine. Considering its unique value proposition, I kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at a special introductory offer of $1400000. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of collaborating with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,400,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,400,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
